Installation

Source: vignettes/installation.Rmd
installation.Rmd

Requirements/dependencies

  • R (>= version 4.1)
  • quarto CLI
    • Downloads available for different platforms here: https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/releases
    • When installing on Linux, make sure you include quarto in your PATH variable, see instructions here
    • Ensure that quarto is correctly installed through quarto check

Installation of oncoEnrichR with R commands

  1. install.packages('remotes')
  2. remotes::install_github('sigven/oncoEnrichR', ref = "v1.5.2")
  3. library(oncoEnrichR)
